title: Riot please start monitoring in client chat and banning these instalockers.
body:
I am so sick of every game where i'm not premade with at least 3 people (and even then it's way too often) where we have people in normals just stealing roles they didn't get.

It's gotten ridiculous at this point, and i just had 2 of them in one game, and was so fed up i afk'd for the remake.

(As a side note, if i continue typing in chat will it stop a remake?)

replies.body:
>admitting that you went afk
>calls for others to get banned

Yes i want these people banned, i've had at least 5 of them recently, and i am just plain sick of it, and getting 2 in one games makes me just afk to spare both myself, and the 2 others on my team the game (we had 2 mids, and 2 jungles, cause of these fuckwits.)

Plus leaverbuster won't get me, because i don't afk often enough (plus it wouldn't surprise me if Remake'd leaver busters were lower on the priority of banning)

Instalocking isn't bannable because even though Riot support the "call your role" style of lanes, it is still invented by players. It could have just as easily been "talk it out and decide what role you go". If someone instalocks a champions/lane, even though it can be really annoying, it's not gonna get banned.

I remember a while back when **Lyte** was still at **Riot**, he said the new champion select would be their effort to cut back on role arguments and instalocking. It's worked pretty well in ranked, but normals is still really bad for us since we don't have Blind Pick :(

I doubt they'd develop a whole new chat monitoring system just for OCE and RU. In my opinion our best chance lies in getting Draft Pick Normals implemented.
> 
> _**BTW about /remake:**_

> Typing in chat doesn't prevent you from going AFK, so it shouldn't prevent you from being able to /remake. Although knowing **Riot** everything is probably coded as minions and full of bugs XD

>In my opinion our best chance lies in getting Draft Pick Normals implemented.

Yeah just like Ranked solo will be implemented

Oh wait.

Ahaha the solo queue debacle was actually insanely bad I'll give you that :D

These things take time though, a little patience goes a long way. It wasn't too long ago that we didn't have 24/7 ranked. Now we do.
It wasn't to long ago we had normal Draft as well.
True, I feel it will be back soon anyways. I've had my eye on those [OP.GG](http://oce.op.gg/statistics/tier/) ranked stats. We've actually grown by over 25% there #hope
Hopefully TT will be on all the time too, maybe even ranked. ^^

That's probably really far out for us, LAN had around 350,000 ranked players when they got permanent TT. 

Although I always wondered why no one makes a custom game TT queuing community :)
Well, maybe having it on temporarily everyday shouldn't be far. :D
I've complained about blind pick for years. It needs to go and be replaced by draft.
